entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -20.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 10:45 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -20.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -23.7°C
Wind: NNW 57 km/h gust 66 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 33 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 33 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
